p: A dried specimen of the case isolate HKU44 T (the holotype) was deposited to UAMH whereas living cultures of HKU44 T were deposited to UAMH and the Culture Collection of Switzerland (CCOS). The ITS, partial 28S nrDNA, partial 18S nrDNA and partial Î²-tubulin gene sequences of HKU44 T and the ex-type/reference strains of other Pleurostoma species were deposited in the DDBJ/ENA/GenBank databases (Table S1).
